item.title: Sharding or Partitioning
item.description: Technique used by some data stores to reduce contention without sacrificing consistency. Records are distributed across nodes using a Shard Key or a Partition Key that will be used by the Database Router that redirects requests to the correct shard/partition. Benefits: Contention is isolated to a shard/partition. Given that each shard stores a part of the dataset, it is only handling a small part of the overall load. Improves elasticity.
